name: autocomplete_recipe_search
description: Autocomplete a partial input to suggest possible recipe names.

number.desciption: The number of results to return (between 1 and 25).

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: analyze_recipe
description: This endpoint allows you to send raw recipe information, such as title, servings, and ingredients, to then see what we compute (badges, diets, nutrition, and more). This is useful if you have your own recipe data and want to enrich it with our semantic analysis.

ingredients.desciption: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line (separate lines with \n).

instructions.desciption: The preparation instructions, one step per line (separate lines with \n).

includeNutrition.desciption: Whether nutrition data should be added to correctly parsed ingredients.

includeTaste.desciption: Whether taste data should be added to correctly parsed ingredients.

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: summarize_recipe
description: Automatically generate a short description that summarizes key information about the recipe.

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: analyze_recipe_instructions
description: This endpoint allows you to break down instructions into atomic steps. Furthermore, each step will contain the ingredients and equipment required. Additionally, all ingredients and equipment from the recipe's instructions will be extracted independently of the step they're used in.

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

ingredientList.desciption: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line (separate lines with \n).

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: analyze_a_recipe_search_query
description: Parse a recipe search query to find out its intention.

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: guess_nutrition_by_dish_name
description: Estimate the macronutrients of a dish based on its title.

apiKey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
